00045 template<class MainProp, class OtherProp, class VaryProp, int MainPropAlt,int OtherPropAlt,int VaryPropAlt>
00046 class SolverBase : public DesignByContract
00047 {
00048 
00049         // The following kills Borland C Builder 5.5. I don't know if it can
00050         // be worked around or not. I tried :-)
00051         // friend class ZeroIn<SolverBase,VaryProp,OtherProp>;
00052 
00053         protected:
00055                 SolverBase(const MainProp &mp,const OtherProp &op){
00056                         //cerr << "Running SolverBase creator" << endl;
00057                         this->mp=mp;
00058                         this->op=op;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 virtual ~SolverBase(){}
00062 
00063         public:
00064 
00065                 virtual void setLowerBound(const VaryProp &lowerbound){
00066                         this->lowerbound = lowerbound;
00067                 }
00068                 virtual void setUpperBound(const VaryProp &upperbound){
00069                         this->upperbound = upperbound;
00070                 }
00071 
00072 
00074                 void setTarget(const OtherProp &op){
00075                         this->op=op;
00076                 }
00077 
00079                 void setMainProp(const MainProp &mp){
00080                         this->mp=mp;
00081                 }
00082 
00084 
00089                 SteamCalculator
00090                 solve(
00091                         OtherProp   maxerror
00092                         ,VaryProp   tol
00093                 ){
00094                         ZeroIn<SolverBase,OtherProp,VaryProp> z;
00095 
00096                         //cerr << endl << "Solving for "<< SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::name() << " = " << op << " by varying " << SteamProperty<VaryProp,VaryPropAlt>::name() << ", and with " << SteamProperty<MainProp,MainPropAlt>::name() << " fixed at " << mp << endl;
00097 
00098                         try{
00099 
00100                                 //S.set_pT(P_CRIT,T);
00101 
00102                                 z.setLowerBound(lowerbound);
00103                                 z.setUpperBound(upperbound);
00104                                 z.setTolerance(tol);
00105 
00106                                 z.setMethod(&SolverBase::getError_vp);
00107 
00108                                 z.visit(this);
00109 
00110                                 if(!z.isSolved(maxerror)){
00111                                         std::stringstream s;
00112                                         s.flags(std::ios_base::showbase);
00113                                         s << "Failed solution: target "<< SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::name() << " = " << op << ", with " << SteamProperty<MainProp,MainPropAlt>::name() << " fixed at " << mp << std::endl;
00114 
00115                                         s << " (error was " << z.getError() << ", max allowed is " << maxerror << ")";
00116                                         throw std::runtime_error(s.str());
00117                                 }
00118 
00119                                 setVaryProp(z.getSolution());
00120 
00121                                 return S;
00122                         }catch(std::exception &e){
00123                                 std::stringstream s;
00124                                 s << "Solver<" << SteamProperty<MainProp,MainPropAlt>::name() << "," << SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::name() << "," << SteamProperty<VaryProp,VaryPropAlt>::name() << ">::solve: " << e.what();
00125                                 throw std::runtime_error(s.str());
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128         protected:
00129 
00130                 virtual void setVaryProp(const VaryProp &vp) = 0;
00131 
00132                 OtherProp getError_vp(const VaryProp &vp){
00133                         //cerr << endl << "Solver::getError_vp: " << SteamProperty<VaryProp,VaryPropAlt>::name() << " = " << vp;
00134 
00135                         setVaryProp(vp);
00136 
00137                         //cerr << " -> " << SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::name() << " = " << SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::get(S) ;
00138 
00139                         return SteamProperty<OtherProp,OtherPropAlt>::get(S) - op;
00140                 }
00141 
00142         protected:
00143 
00144                 OtherProp op;
00145                 MainProp mp;
00146                 SteamCalculator S;
00147                 VaryProp lowerbound;
00148                 VaryProp upperbound;
00149 };

00197 /*
00198 
00199 // Solving for specific volume given temperature
00200 class Solver<Temperature,SpecificVolume,Pressure,0,0,0>
00201         : public SolverBase<Temperature,SpecificVolume,Pressure,0,0,0>
00202 {
00203         public:
00204 
00205                 Solver(Temperature T,SpecificVolume v, bool isSuperheated=false)
00206                         : SolverBase<Temperature,SpecificVolume,Pressure,0,0,0>(T,v){
00207 
00208 
00209                         if(T > T_CRIT){
00210                                 lowerbound = P_MIN;
00211                                 upperbound = P_MAX;
00212                         }else{
00213                                 if(isSuperheated){
00214                                         lowerbound = Boundaries::getSatPres_T(T);
00215                                         upperbound = P_MAX;
00216                                 }else{
00217                                         lowerbound = P_MIN;
00218                                         upperbound = Boundaries::getSatPres_T(T);
00219                                 }
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222 
00223         protected:
00224 
00225                 virtual void setVaryProp(const Pressure &p){
00226                         S.set_pT(p,mp);
00227                 }
00228 
00229 };

00244 template<class OtherProp, int OtherPropAlt>
00245 class Solver<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>
00246         : public SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>
00247 {
00248         public:
00249 
00250                 Solver(Temperature T,OtherProp op)
00251                         : SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>(T,op){
00252                         SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::lowerbound = P_TRIPLE;
00253                         SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::upperbound = P_MAX;
00254                 }
00255 
00256         protected:
00257 
00258                 virtual void setVaryProp(const Pressure &p){
00259                         SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::S.set_pT(p,SolverBase<Temperature,OtherProp,Pressure,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::mp);
00260                 }
00261 };

00267 template<class OtherProp, int OtherPropAlt>
00268 class Solver<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>
00269         : public SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>
00270 {
00271         public:
00272 
00273                 Solver(Pressure p, OtherProp op)
00274                         : SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>(p,op){
00275                         //std::cerr << "Varying Temperature!" << std::endl;
00276                         SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::lowerbound = T_MIN;
00277                         SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::upperbound = T_MAX;
00278                 }
00279 
00280         protected:
00281 
00282                 virtual void setVaryProp(const Temperature &T){
00283                         //std::cerr << "Setting temperature to " << T;
00284                         SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::S.set_pT(SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::mp,T);
00285                         //std::cerr << "Gives h = " << SolverBase<Pressure,OtherProp,Temperature,0,OtherPropAlt,0>::S.specenthalpy() << std::endl;
00286                 }
00287 };
